TITLE: AI is moving inside the operations, and behind the CEO desk, at America's small businesses
SUMMARY: More small businesses are leveraging generative artificial intelligence to give them an edge when it comes to hiring the best talent.

TITLE: Op-ed: Amid DEI retreat, America's small businesses are not caving like big corporations
SUMMARY: A CNBC|SurveyMonkey study finds small businesses continue to support diversity, equity and inclusion efforts even as political scrutiny intensifies.

TITLE: Treasury sets March 21 deadline for millions of businesses to report ownership information or risk fines of $10,000 or more
SUMMARY: The Treasury Department set a March 21 deadline to report "beneficial ownership information" after a Texas court lifted a block on enforcement.

TITLE: In wake of southern California wildfires, a diverse small business community looks to rebuild
SUMMARY: Business owners in Altadena hope to see the diverse community that their organizations thrived in rise from the ashes.

TITLE: In wake of Southern California wildfires, a diverse small business community looks to rebuild
SUMMARY: Business owners in Altadena hope to see the diverse community that their organizations thrived in rise from the ashes.

TITLE: Treasury Department suspends enforcement of ownership information reporting for millions of businesses
SUMMARY: The Treasury Department has halted enforcement of beneficial ownership information, or BOI, reporting for millions of businesses.

TITLE: Meta is targeting 'hundreds of millions' of businesses in agentic AI deployment
SUMMARY: Meta expects a market of hundreds of millions of small businesses where gen AI will directly interact with customers, says head of AI for Business, Clara Shih.

TITLE: Trump’s Canadian tariffs are having a chilling effect on Vermont’s small business owners
SUMMARY: The Green Mountain State's small businesses are getting caught in the tariff crossfire between the United States and Canada.

TITLE: Trump tariffs will lead to abandoned freight at ports as cash-strapped businesses reject orders
SUMMARY: With tariffs set to rise exponentially for U.S. businesses that import, many shipments may be stranded at ports by cash-strapped owners.

TITLE: Trump tariffs on China will soon bring 'irreversible' damage to many American businesses
SUMMARY: Apple's iPhone and other tech got a reprieve from Trump's China tariffs policy, but most businesses will soon face 'irreversible' damage from the trade war.
